name: Bumpy Road (itch) (JimOfLeisure)
description:
I feel like toying with a game engine and submitting to an Itch.io jam, namely 2021 Variety Megajam. 

I'm now successfully generating a never-ending bumpy ground to roll down, and after that I hope to work on controlling the angle of the hill, and the goal will be to go as fast as you can without launching into the air. If you go too far in the air, a parachute will deploy to get the ball safely back down to the ground. (Controls and parachute not yet implemented!)

Known issues: It's possible to bounce back to the left and fall off the platform, and if it does it may continue to do so until the game page is reloaded. It may also go so fast it starts skipping making new ground and might fall that way, and then the ball will fall forever until the page is refreshed.
